scripts.watch: nodemon --exec 'npm run html && npm run serve'  src/*.md
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run css && npm run fonts && npm run img && npm run svg && npm run assets && npm run html
scripts.css: node-sass --include-path node_modules/reveal.js/css/theme/source src/css --output-style  compressed -o app/css/  src/css
scripts.img: mkdir -p app/img/ && cp -r src/img/*.png  src/img/*.jpg app/img
scripts.html: for file in `ls src/*.md`; do filebase=${file##*/}; pandoc -f markdown+smart -t revealjs  --standalone --css=css/main.css  --mathjax -V revealjs-url=assets/reveal.js $file -o app/${filebase%.*}.html; done
